Text: This is an excellent show, great quality all round, thanks alot to the uploader!!
I converted all these to dvd. Watched them on a 42 inch tv, and i thought the quality was fantastic for a straight dvd rip, many thanks to the uploader for taking the time to do this.
If there is any chance at all that you can upload the complete "Life On Mars" (UK) as well, that would be terrific!
Thanks For the up. It's the best and only one around, A10 V10.

Very good series!! I thought it was the American version of the Bristish 'Life on Mars' but it's in fact like a second part. Nice surprise! The same actors but for the main one. DCI Hunt, my favourite. Shame there's no more policemen like him any more!!! 
I recommend this series but I suggest you see 'Life on Mars' first. You can see 'Ashes to Ashes' without seeing 'Life on Mars' previously anyway. 
Soundtrack: awesome
(And if you like this, I also recommend "Mad dogs" with Philip Glenister, the actor who plays DCI Hunt, and John Simm, who plays Sam Taylor in 'Life on Mars'.
Enjoy!
A:10, v:10. 
Thankyou River-Haggis!
